__e: I'm so sorry I failed you.
Clearly, I haven't, but I want you to know that the failure has been mine, not yours.
He's coming because I failed. Now he'll kill me.
If anyone here failed, who would it have been?
Now I've got to do what I've got to do, and... .. I'm afraid it has to be you that tells him he failed.
I don't have numbers on it, but I feel secure in saying... you fail Shakespeare, you don't get into Harvard.
Well, Mr. Queen, you failed to protect the city you love.
I failed at the one thing I spent my whole life doing.
My power is nothing against his.
And now? Now that we've failed? He'll kill her.
Explain to me why I need to hear anything else out of your mouth other than you fucked up.
But if we are not helping him, then it is we who have failed him.
I thought the boy's father hadn't survived and I had failed him and I couldn't...
I failed, and I don't know what to do.
I wasn't there for my baby, so I figured... - You know, I should be there for her.
Look. having somebody help you doesn't mean that you failed.
No, what you didn't see, what you failed to see is the man I really am, right in front of you the whole time.
You can't begin to imagine the life you denied yourself.
